Title: TMNT
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Kevin Munroe, Peter Laird (characters), Kevin Eastman (characters)
Actors: Chris Evans, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Mako, Kevin Smith
Plot: When the world is threatened by an ancient evil, the four adolescent turtles must reunite and overcome their faults in order to stand against it.
Production: Mirage Studios, Imagi Animation Studios, Warner Bros., Weinstein Company
